TopicTitle: So, Space Shuttles (Just hear me out)

Articles.Content:
So, I know there is multiple mods and such that feature things like Space Shuttles and such, but that's not really the question.This is more of a two question thing.

One: Are space shuttle parts planning to be added?

Two: What would you think of having parts to build a space shuttle type thing?
TBF, all I think they need for spaceshuttles is a engine with higher gimbal and the SAS to be even stronger than it is now. Most of the parts to build a replica spaceshuttle are already in the game.

You can do a shuttle right now with stock parts, but it's ridiculously hard and adding a payload delivery bay is kind of out of the question. I always thought the shuttle was a bit of a fools errand, it ended up costing way more per pound than a staged rocket.

This guy managed to make a cargo bay with stock parts for his SSTO.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=NEKtKB76udA

At about 6:30, you see it working.

I made a shuttle out of mostly stock parts, but used a TT cargo bay, and landing gear. It uses dual drop tanks, so isn't quite like the nasa space shuttle.
